content: Hi all, just wanted to let everyone know that my Mondays at 2 got taken up by a weekly meeting at work :/
So, with the current Chalk design meeting schedule, I won't be able to make them anymore
Any possibility that we can reschedule to another time?
(I think my meetings are every other week, but I have to double check)
They're weekly until March, then every 3 weeks
We can reschedule, but note that next week's meeting has already been cancelled because of Mozilla All Hands
(hopefully the meeting time won't change too drastically, since it's currently at 9PM for me which is nice)

I think it'll heavily depend on @nikomatsakis's schedule, but I'm available Monday, 1PM (an hour earlier), or 4PM (two hours laters). Tuesdays before 12 or after 4. Or any time any other days. All EST.
I'd be happy to reschedule
I'm pretty flexible on Mondays
I miht actually be happier on another day though
I'm making a renewed effort to make Monday/Friday be days dedicated to coding and reviewing
and really clear out syncs and meetings
@detrumi how would Tuesday work for you ?
well, let me go fish out some times from my calendar
indeed, though, this week I am in Berlin for the Mozilla All Hands, which generally means it is hard for me to get online, although it very much varies
Tuesday works for me
so I'm slowly coming back online
Should we reschedule meeting for this week to Tuesday then?
I've also been super sidetracked with work the past couple weeks
Definitely should try to reschedule meetings for Tuesday
How should we do this? I could set up something like http://whenisgood.net/
usually I make a doodle
let's probably skip this week and figure to start next week
I did btw have some good ideas on the plane
well, I Guess it depends if it s just @detrumi, you and I :)
I'm good with Tuesday at 4pm for example
Yeah, I guess it depends on who's gonna be around
Does anyone have any objections with Tuesdays at 4PM?
I know @Aaron Hill wanted to start attending meetings too
that's fine by me
Also gonna tag @David Barsky since they've also showed up to a couple of recent meetings
fine by me too! I'm more of a lurker :)
Ok then I think that's basically everyone that's good for Tuesday at 4PM EST
(I'll also tag @matklad and @Florian Diebold since they might be interested in knowing, even though they don't usually show up to meetings)
I'm good with skipping this week and starting again next week
OK, I will adjust the calendar
FYI, I'll be out of town on the 18th, which I've indicated with a No response
